Description: Limestone statuette of youth (kouros) striding. Fragment of lower torso and upper thighs. Coarse yellow-grey limestone.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Ashmolean Museum, Oxford. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Höckmann 2007 / Zyprisch-griechische Kleinplastik: Kouroi, andere Figuren und plastisch verzierte Gefässe (no. N15)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (CD.097) (Phase 3)
